trans-unit.source: Accessing your apps
trans-unit.target: Accessing your apps

trans-unit.source: Learn what clients are supported for Azure RemoteApp and how to access your apps.
trans-unit.target: Learn what clients are supported for Azure RemoteApp and how to access your apps.

trans-unit.source: Accessing your apps in Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Accessing your apps in Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: One of the beauties of Azure RemoteApp is that you can access apps from any of your devices.
trans-unit.target: One of the beauties of Azure RemoteApp is that you can access apps from any of your devices.

trans-unit.source: Even better, you can start working on one device and then seamlessly transition to a second device and pick up right where you left off.
trans-unit.target: Even better, you can start working on one device and then seamlessly transition to a second device and pick up right where you left off.

trans-unit.source: To get started you need to download the appropriate client for your device and sign in to the service.
trans-unit.target: To get started you need to download the appropriate client for your device and sign in to the service.

trans-unit.source: In this topic, we'll review the clients currently supported and how to download them before I show you how to sign in to RemoteApp from each of the clients.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, we'll review the clients currently supported and how to download them before I show you how to sign in to RemoteApp from each of the clients.

trans-unit.source: Supported clients
trans-unit.target: Supported clients

trans-unit.source: You can access RemoteApp using the steps below if your device is running one of these operating systems:
trans-unit.target: You can access RemoteApp using the steps below if your device is running one of these operating systems:

trans-unit.source: Windows 10 preview
trans-unit.target: Windows 10 preview

trans-unit.source: Windows 8.1
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1

trans-unit.source: Windows 8
trans-unit.target: Windows 8

trans-unit.source: Windows 7 Service Pack 1
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 Service Pack 1

trans-unit.source: Windows RT
trans-unit.target: Windows RT

trans-unit.source: Windows Phone 8.1
trans-unit.target: Windows Phone 8.1

trans-unit.source: iOS
trans-unit.target: iOS

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X

trans-unit.source: Android
trans-unit.target: Android

trans-unit.source: What about thin clients?
trans-unit.target: What about thin clients?

trans-unit.source: The following Windows Embedded thin clients are supported:
trans-unit.target: The following Windows Embedded thin clients are supported:

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded Standard 7 with Service Pack 1
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded Standard 7 with Service Pack 1

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded POSReady7
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded POSReady7

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded Thin PC
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded Thin PC

trans-unit.source: Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry
trans-unit.target: Windows Embedded 8.1 Industry

trans-unit.source: Downloading the client
trans-unit.target: Downloading the client

trans-unit.source: No matter what platform you are using, the client you need to access RemoteApp can be found on the [Remote Desktop client download](https://www.remoteapp.windowsazure.com/ClientDownload/AllClients.aspx) page.
trans-unit.target: No matter what platform you are using, the client you need to access RemoteApp can be found on the [Remote Desktop client download](https://www.remoteapp.windowsazure.com/ClientDownload/AllClients.aspx) page.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the different links will either directly start downloading the client or will send you to the client download page in the app store for that platform.
trans-unit.target: Clicking the different links will either directly start downloading the client or will send you to the client download page in the app store for that platform.

trans-unit.source: Install the client by following the instructions on the screen.
trans-unit.target: Install the client by following the instructions on the screen.

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the client on your device and launched it, jump to the corresponding section below to learn how to sign in to RemoteApp from that client.
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the client on your device and launched it, jump to the corresponding section below to learn how to sign in to RemoteApp from that client.

trans-unit.source: Android
trans-unit.target: Android

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the Google Play store, you can find it in your app list under **Remote Desktop**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the Google Play store, you can find it in your app list under **Remote Desktop**.

trans-unit.source: Launching the app brings you to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.
trans-unit.target: Launching the app brings you to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, tap the add button **""+""** and tap **Azure RemoteApp**.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, tap the add button **""+""** and tap **Azure RemoteApp**.

trans-unit.source: Empty Connection Center
trans-unit.target: Empty Connection Center

trans-unit.source: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service.
trans-unit.target: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service.

trans-unit.source: Tap **Get started**.
trans-unit.target: Tap **Get started**.

trans-unit.source: Sign in prompt
trans-unit.target: Sign in prompt

trans-unit.source: On the next page, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.

trans-unit.source: This begins the sign-in process using Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This begins the sign-in process using Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: First Azure Active Directory page
trans-unit.target: First Azure Active Directory page

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (previously called "LiveID") or organization ID.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (previously called "LiveID") or organization ID.

trans-unit.source: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.
trans-unit.target: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.

trans-unit.source: If you are, select the invitations you trust and tap **Done**.
trans-unit.target: If you are, select the invitations you trust and tap **Done**.

trans-unit.source: Invitations page
trans-unit.target: Invitations page

trans-unit.source: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.
trans-unit.target: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.

trans-unit.source: Tap one of the apps to start using it.
trans-unit.target: Tap one of the apps to start using it.

trans-unit.source: Connection Center with a feed
trans-unit.target: Connection Center with a feed

trans-unit.source: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.
trans-unit.target: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.

trans-unit.source: To do so, tap **Go to free trial** when prompted.
trans-unit.target: To do so, tap **Go to free trial** when prompted.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed prompt
trans-unit.target: Demo feed prompt

trans-unit.source: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: iOS
trans-unit.target: iOS

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the App store, you can find it in your app list under **RD Client**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the App store, you can find it in your app list under **RD Client**.

trans-unit.source: Launching the app brings you to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.
trans-unit.target: Launching the app brings you to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, tap the add button **""+""** and tap **Add Azure RemoteApp**.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, tap the add button **""+""** and tap **Add Azure RemoteApp**.

trans-unit.source: Empty Connection Center
trans-unit.target: Empty Connection Center

trans-unit.source: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service, to start that process, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.
trans-unit.target: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service, to start that process, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.

trans-unit.source: Sign in prompt
trans-unit.target: Sign in prompt

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.

trans-unit.source: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.
trans-unit.target: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.

trans-unit.source: If you are, select the invitations you trust and tap **Done**.
trans-unit.target: If you are, select the invitations you trust and tap **Done**.

trans-unit.source: Invitations page
trans-unit.target: Invitations page

trans-unit.source: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.
trans-unit.target: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.

trans-unit.source: Tap one of the apps to launch it and start using it.
trans-unit.target: Tap one of the apps to launch it and start using it.

trans-unit.source: Connection Center with a feed
trans-unit.target: Connection Center with a feed

trans-unit.source: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.
trans-unit.target: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.

trans-unit.source: To do so, tap **Go to free trial** when prompted.
trans-unit.target: To do so, tap **Go to free trial** when prompted.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed prompt
trans-unit.target: Demo feed prompt

trans-unit.source: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the App store, you can find it in your app list under **Microsoft Remote Desktop**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the App store, you can find it in your app list under **Microsoft Remote Desktop**.

trans-unit.source: Launching the app brings you to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.
trans-unit.target: Launching the app brings you to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, click the **Azure RemoteApp** button.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, click the **Azure RemoteApp** button.

trans-unit.source: Empty Connection Center
trans-unit.target: Empty Connection Center

trans-unit.source: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service, to start that process, tap **Get Started**.
trans-unit.target: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service, to start that process, tap **Get Started**.

trans-unit.source: Sign in prompt
trans-unit.target: Sign in prompt

trans-unit.source: On the next page, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.

trans-unit.source: This begins the sign in process using Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This begins the sign in process using Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: First Azure Active Directory page
trans-unit.target: First Azure Active Directory page

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.

trans-unit.source: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.
trans-unit.target: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.

trans-unit.source: If you are, select the invitations you trust and close the dialog.
trans-unit.target: If you are, select the invitations you trust and close the dialog.

trans-unit.source: Invitations page
trans-unit.target: Invitations page

trans-unit.source: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.
trans-unit.target: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.

trans-unit.source: Double-click one of the apps to launch it and start using it.
trans-unit.target: Double-click one of the apps to launch it and start using it.

trans-unit.source: Connection Center with a feed
trans-unit.target: Connection Center with a feed

trans-unit.source: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.
trans-unit.target: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.

trans-unit.source: To do so, click **Go to free trial** when prompted.
trans-unit.target: To do so, click **Go to free trial** when prompted.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed prompt
trans-unit.target: Demo feed prompt

trans-unit.source: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Windows (All supported versions except Windows Phone)
trans-unit.target: Windows (All supported versions except Windows Phone)

trans-unit.source: The client launches automatically after it finishes installing, however when you need to access it again later it can be found in your app list under the name **Azure RemoteApp**.
trans-unit.target: The client launches automatically after it finishes installing, however when you need to access it again later it can be found in your app list under the name **Azure RemoteApp**.

trans-unit.source: Ater launching the client, the first page you see welcomes you to Azure RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: Ater launching the client, the first page you see welcomes you to Azure RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: To proceed, click on **Get Started**.
trans-unit.target: To proceed, click on **Get Started**.

trans-unit.source: Welcome page of the Azure RemoteApp client
trans-unit.target: Welcome page of the Azure RemoteApp client

trans-unit.source: The next page starts the sign in process for Azure RemoteApp using Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: The next page starts the sign in process for Azure RemoteApp using Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: This process should look familiar if you have used Microsoft services in the past.
trans-unit.target: This process should look familiar if you have used Microsoft services in the past.

trans-unit.source: Start by typing your **email address** and click **Continue**.
trans-unit.target: Start by typing your **email address** and click **Continue**.

trans-unit.source: First Azure Active Directory prompt
trans-unit.target: First Azure Active Directory prompt

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.

trans-unit.source: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.
trans-unit.target: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.

trans-unit.source: If you are, select the invitations you trust and click **Done**.
trans-unit.target: If you are, select the invitations you trust and click **Done**.

trans-unit.source: Invitations page of the Azure RemoteApp client
trans-unit.target: Invitations page of the Azure RemoteApp client

trans-unit.source: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.
trans-unit.target: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.

trans-unit.source: Double-click one of the apps to launch it and start using it.
trans-unit.target: Double-click one of the apps to launch it and start using it.

trans-unit.source: Connection Center of the Azure RemoteApp client
trans-unit.target: Connection Center of the Azure RemoteApp client

trans-unit.source: If no one has sent you an invitation yet, don't worry we've got you covered!
trans-unit.target: If no one has sent you an invitation yet, don't worry we've got you covered!

trans-unit.source: You'll still have access to a demo collection so you can test out the service.
trans-unit.target: You'll still have access to a demo collection so you can test out the service.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp

trans-unit.source: Windows Phone 8.1
trans-unit.target: Windows Phone 8.1

trans-unit.source: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the Windows Phone 8.1 store, you can find it in your app list under **Remote Desktop**.
trans-unit.target: Once you have installed the Microsoft Remote Desktop app from the Windows Phone 8.1 store, you can find it in your app list under **Remote Desktop**.

trans-unit.source: Launching the app brings you directly to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.
trans-unit.target: Launching the app brings you directly to an empty Connection Center, unless you've already been using the app.

trans-unit.source: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, tap the add button **""+""** at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: To get started with Azure RemoteApp, tap the add button **""+""** at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: Empty Connection Center
trans-unit.target: Empty Connection Center

trans-unit.source: Next, tap on **Azure RemoteApp**.
trans-unit.target: Next, tap on **Azure RemoteApp**.

trans-unit.source: Add item page
trans-unit.target: Add item page

trans-unit.source: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service, to start that process, tap **connect**.
trans-unit.target: You need to sign in with your email address to access the service, to start that process, tap **connect**.

trans-unit.source: Sign in prompt
trans-unit.target: Sign in prompt

trans-unit.source: On the next page, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.
trans-unit.target: On the next page, type in your **email address** and tap **Continue**.

trans-unit.source: This begins the sign in process using Azure Active Directory.
trans-unit.target: This begins the sign in process using Azure Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: First Azure Active Directory page
trans-unit.target: First Azure Active Directory page

trans-unit.source: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.
trans-unit.target: Follow the instructions on the screen to sign in with your Microsoft account (LiveID) or Organization ID.

trans-unit.source: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.
trans-unit.target: Once signed in, you may be presented with a page listing all the invitations you have received.

trans-unit.source: If you are, select the invitations you trust and tap **save**.
trans-unit.target: If you are, select the invitations you trust and tap **save**.

trans-unit.source: Invitations page
trans-unit.target: Invitations page

trans-unit.source: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.
trans-unit.target: After accepting your invitations, the list of apps you have access to will be downloaded to your device and made available in the Connection Center.

trans-unit.source: Tap one of the apps to launch it and start using it.
trans-unit.target: Tap one of the apps to launch it and start using it.

trans-unit.source: Connection Center with a feed
trans-unit.target: Connection Center with a feed

trans-unit.source: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.
trans-unit.target: If you do not have an invitation yet, you can still try out the service.

trans-unit.source: To do so, tap **yes** when prompted.
trans-unit.target: To do so, tap **yes** when prompted.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed prompt
trans-unit.target: Demo feed prompt

trans-unit.source: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.
trans-unit.target: This will give you access to a basic set of apps to get you started with RemoteApp.

trans-unit.source: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp
trans-unit.target: Demo feed for Azure RemoteApp
